title: Double Room
description: Double Room is a comfortable and spacious accommodation option offered by our hotel. These rooms are designed to provide a relaxing and enjoyable stay for our guests. With elegant and modern decor, our Double Rooms are equipped with two cozy double beds, making them ideal for couples or travelers looking for extra space. Each room is thoughtfully designed with your comfort in mind.
hotelsFacilities: Buffet breakfast as per the Itinerary
Visit eight villages showcasing Polynesian culture
Complimentary Camel safari, Bonfire
All toll tax, parking, fuel, and driver allowances
Comfortable and hygienic vehicle

title: Common Room
description: A Common Room, often referred to as a shared or communal room, is a flexible and cost-effective accommodation option for travelers who value social interaction and shared spaces. These rooms are designed to offer budget-conscious travelers a convenient and communal place to stay while providing essential amenities and a sense of community.
